Ocean and Coastal

Climate Change Funding Wizard

Wizard Search Add

The Ocean and Coastal Climate Change Funding Wizard was developed by the West Coast Governors Alliance on Ocean Health (WCGA) Climate Change Action Coordination Team. This tool can be used to search and filter through grants relating to climate change with the goal of providing funding to address issues that impact the ocean and coasts of California, Oregon, and Washington. Our Ocean and Coastal Climate Change Funding Wizard was modeled after the California Air Resources Boardâ€™s catalogue.

The Climate Change Funding Wizard is funded by the National Fish and Wildlife Foundation.
